dialogue.title: Please give correct answers
dialogue.message: Accurate answers help us - help you better. Medical and support staff are valuable and very limited. Be a responsible citizen.

start: Please note that information from this chat will be used for monitoring & management of the current health crisis and research in the fight against COVID-19.

symptoms.label: Are you experiencing any of the following symptoms?

possible_values.value: loss of senses of smell and taste
possible_values.text: loss of senses of smell and taste

past.label: Have you ever had any of the following:

symptom_past.label: Have you ever had any of the following:

travel.label: Have you traveled anywhere internationally in the last 28-45 days?

social.label: Which of the following apply to you?

possible_values.value: I have recently interacted or lived with someone who has tested positive for COVID -19
possible_values.text: I have recently interacted or lived with someone who has tested positive for COVID -19

possible_values.value: I am a healthcare worker and I examined a COVID-19 confirmed case without protective gear
possible_values.text: I am a healthcare worker and I examined a COVID-19 confirmed case without protective gear

social_when.label: When did this interaction take place?

symptom_past_travel_social.label: Which of the following apply to you?

possible_values.value: Traveled internationally in the last 14 days
possible_values.text: Traveled internationally in the last 14 days

possible_values.value: Recently interacted or lived or currently live with someone who has tested positive for COVID -19
possible_values.text: Recently interacted or lived or currently live with someone who has tested positive for COVID -19

great.label:
Your infection risk is low. We recommend that you stay at home to avoid any chance of exposure to the Novel Coronavirus.

Retake the Self-Assessment Test if you develop symptoms or come in contact with a COVID-19 confirmed patient.


Do visit https://www.mohfw.gov.in/ for more information

unwell.label:
While you are unwell, your infection risk is low. Do remember that currently it is safer to consult a doctor through phone or video than to visit the hospital.



Do remember that currently it is safer to consult a doctor through phone or video than to visit the hospital.


We recommend that you stay at home to avoid any chance of exposure to the Novel Coronavirus.



Do visit https://www.mohfw.gov.in/ for more information.

not_eligible.label:
Your infection risk is moderate.



We recommend that you stay at home to avoid any chance of exposure to the Novel Coronavirus. Retake the Self-Assessment Test if you develop symptoms or come in contact with a COVID-19 confirmed patient again.

Do visit https://www.mohfw.gov.in/ for more information

quarantine.label:
Your infection risk is moderate. Please remember to stay quarantined for 14 days after your travel. While you are feeling absolutely healthy, it can take up to 2 weeks for symptoms to show, even if you are infected.


If you experience any coughing, fever or difficulty breathing in the next two weeks, you must schedule your testing by calling toll free help line 1075.


Home quarantine suggested practices: stay at home, do not have visitors, stay at least 6 feet away from other people in your household, use standard hygiene and wash hands frequently, do not share things like towels and utensils.



Do visit https://www.mohfw.gov.in/ for guidelines on home quarantine and taking care.

eligible_suspect.label:
Your infection risk is moderate. If you are or were living with somebody who tested positive for COVID-19, please stay in Home Quarantine. While you are feeling absolutely healthy, it can up to 2 weeks for symptoms to show, even if you are infected.

Please get a test at the earliest from Day 5 onwards, and within 14 days of the first interaction or earlier if symptoms appear.

List of testing centers: https://icmr.nic.in/node/39071

Home quarantine suggested practices: stay at home, do not have visitors, stay at least 6 feet away from other people in your household, use standard hygiene and wash hands frequently, do not share things like towels and utensils.


Do visit https://www.mohfw.gov.in/ for guidelines on home quarantine and taking care.

eligible.label:
You are advised for testing as your infection risk is high. Please call the toll-free help line 1075 to schedule your testing.

List of testing centers: https://icmr.nic.in/node/39071



Please visit https://www.mohfw.gov.in/ for more information on testing and quarantine guidelines.

eligible_travel.label:
You are advised for testing as your infection risk is high. Please call the toll-free help line 1075 to schedule your testing.

List of testing centers: https://icmr.nic.in/node/39071



Please visit https://www.mohfw.gov.in/ for more information on testing and quarantine guidelines.

confirm.label:
Thank you for taking this assessment.



If the information provided by you is accurate, it indicates that you are either unwell or at risk. Your test results and location history need to be sent to the Health Ministry to help you and help identify potential hotspots where infection may be spreading.
